data.text:
Bankura University is one of the Premium University of West Bengal. It was established in 2014 under West Bengal Act XIX of 2013. The University offers undergraduate and Postgraduate course and admission in both programmes is granted on the Basis of Merit. The courses which are offered in Bankura University is organized under faculties such as Social Science, Science, Law, Education etc. Admission Process for both UG and PG Courses is in online mode. Bankura University comprises of four campuses at Purandarpur, Puabagan, Mithila and Chhandar in Bankura district. Read the Article below to Know more about Bankura University.

Bankura University

Bankura University is recognised under Section 2(f) of UGC Act, 1956. The University has 26 affiliated colleges. The University provides the facility of online application submission of application form. All payment during registration and admission will be made through electronic mode. Have a quick glance at Bankura University from the table mentioned below.

Quick Links

Time Table

Admit Card

Result

Bankura University – Admission Process

In Order to get admission into Undergraduate or Postgraduate programme in Bankura University, Students are required to do registration. After completion of Registration process, subject-wise Merit List will be published. This Merit List will contain the names of all the eligible Candidates on the basis of the Marks obtained in Graduation Level of their respective courses/ subject. After publication of Merit List, the Candidates have to apply their preferences for the University / Institute where they intend to take admission. Candidates are required to go through the Information Bulletin carefully before attempting for online application.
